mapper.select:
SELECT ws.id AS 'weighingStatementId', wb.id AS 'weighingBillId', wb.serial_no AS 'weighingBillCode', ws.last_operation_time AS 'lastOperationTime', ws.serial_no AS 'weighingStatementCode', wb.goods_name AS 'goodsName', ROUND(wb.net_weight/200,2) AS 'netWeightY', wb.unit_amount AS 'unitAmountY', ROUND(wb.unit_price/50,2) AS 'unitPriceY', ROUND(ws.trade_amount/100,2) AS 'tradeAmountY', ROUND(wb.staff_charges/100,2) AS 'staffChargesY', ROUND(wb.packing_charges/100,2) AS 'packingChargesY', ROUND(wb.collection_charges/100,2) AS 'collectionChargesY', wb.packingTypeName AS 'packingTypeName', ROUND(ws.trade_amount+wb.staff_charges+wb.packing_charges+wb.collection_charges/100,2) AS 'totalAmountY', ws.version AS 'version' FROM weighing_statement ws INNER JOIN weighing_bill wb ON ws.weighing_bill_id=wb.id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ws.state = 2
AND ws.id IN
#{collectionRecordId}
ORDER BY lastOperationTime DESC
